name: argcache
description: Cache utility that uses method arguments as the key

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --ignore-leaks --require test/config  test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --ignore-leaks --require test/config test/

author: Esco Obong
